The Altilia Approaches

23 Jun 2022 - 1 minute to read
The Altilia Approaches represents a set of services that empowers you to create your own project according to your needs. For each approach, a specific Altilia Module is indicated to be used by the user, business or advanced.

Automate Module

If you are a business user and you want to Automate Business Processes refer to the following services:
    1. Tools: Altilia Workflows™, Altilia Review™, Altilia Connectors™.
    2. Artifacts: Altilia Flows™, Altilia Connector™, Altilia Knowledge Bases™.

Understand Module

If you are a business user and you want to use documents and data for Decision Intelligence purposes refer to the following services :
    1. Tools: Altilia Searches™, Altilia Insights™.
    2. Artifacts: Altilia Knowledge Bases™, Altilia Reports™, Altilia Queries™.

Teach Module

If you are an advanced user and you want to create Skills and Fine-Tune (AI Models) refer to the following services:
    1. Tools: Altilia Labels™, Altilia Models™, Altilia Skills™
    2. Artifacts: Altilia Datasets™, Altilia Skills™, Altilia Knowledge Bases™
